channel.description: Secure your Okta API authentication with JWTs Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Build a JWT for Client Authentication: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/build-self-signed-jwt/java/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code. The focus is geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.
